system.description:
Your time studying the lessons of nature have left you particularly adept at heading its call and calling in turn to its children.  You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain an additional specialty with nature, and the maximum size for an expertise die on nature checks for you is 1d10.
  • You may spend 1 minute and expend either a use of wild shape or a hit die and a point of inspiration to replicate the effect of a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.pdwrag8eq7r0ldcp]{Commune with Nature} spell. Similar to scholar abilities, this does not count as actually casting a spell. Furthermore, you may attempt a DC 15 nature check as an action to regain a use of wild shape.  Each time you do this, the DC for subsequent attempts cumulatively increases by 5, and once you fail a check you cannot attempt to do so again until you finish a long rest.
  • You may add half your scholar levels to your druid level to determine the effect of your wild shape ability, including access to @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.86p2i6t3jepq1c3q]{Improved Natural Bond} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.y5r5pal11p8i9laz]{Greater Natural Bond}.
  • You also gain a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l3qkjox9faldupcy]{Druidic Lore} ability of your choice.
